title: Is the plot affected by any reservation or road lines? If so, are these correctly and clearly marked
clause_text: Is the plot affected by any reservation or road lines? If so, are these correctly and clearly marked on the block plan? *(a)What is the total area of the plot according to the document?

source_pdf.text_snippet: Is the plot affected by any reservation or road lines? If so, are these correctly and clearly marked on the block plan?
